sentences.en: "I do not want my fans to ever emulate that or be that way," says the singer. "I don't want my fans to think they have to be that way to be great.
sentences.cn: 我并不希望歌迷效仿我的做法，也不想让他们误以为要成功就必须得这样，那是以前的事了，在我的低潮期，而且也导致了一系列灾难。

sentences.en: Almost brutalist in presentation, the buttresses emulate medieval crenellations along the top of the structure, effectively emulating castles of yore.
sentences.cn: 几乎是粗野派的表达，沿着建筑顶部的扶壁模仿中世纪的锯齿状物，效仿昔日的城堡。

sentences.en: Employees look to you to show them the behaviors that they should emulate.
sentences.cn: 员工希望你为他们表现出他们应当模仿的行为举止。

sentences.en: Emulate the compassion of Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva, show concern for sentient beings.
sentences.cn: 效法观音菩萨的慈悲, 憨念大众.

sentences.en: Emulate those who have already achieved what you are aspiring to.
sentences.cn: 效仿那些和你有着同样目标而已经达到目标的人.

sentences.en: He hoped to emulate the success of Wilder.
sentences.cn: 他希望效仿怀尔德的成功。

sentences.en: I may emulate his choice of metaphor.
It was natural that he should emulate his brethren.
sentences.cn: 他应当胜过他的教友们,这是很自然的.

sentences.en: Liza giggled triumphantly, and the little ones strove to emulate her.
sentences.cn: 莉莎得意地“哧哧”笑起来, 那些小的也不甘落后.

sentences.en: Now there was added a proclivity to emulate the scale of French colonial rule.
sentences.cn: 现在又增加了一种要同法国殖民统治规模媲美的倾向.

sentences.en: She has heard tell of her mother's theatrical glories, which she longs to emulate.
sentences.cn: 她听人说,她母亲在台上演戏怎么出风头, 便心里痒痒的,也想一试身手.

sentences.en: She tried to emulate you right from the start.
sentences.cn: 她从一开始就努力向你看齐.

sentences.en: Sometimes the tricksters will emulate ancestors, soul, earth or nature.
sentences.cn: 有时,这些骗子模仿成祖先 、 灵魂 、 地球或者大自然.

sentences.en: Teenagers are very sequacious and they often emulate the behavior of their idols.
sentences.cn: 青少年非常盲从，经常模仿他们的偶像的行为。

sentences.en: The new company would emulate Rio in this way.
sentences.cn: 新的必和必拓公司在这方面运作效仿了力拓的方式.

sentences.en: They are the role models for others to emulate.
sentences.cn: 他们的教学表现,大可以作为其他教师的借鉴.

sentences.en: We adopt theory analysis, emulate affirmation and trial adjustment methods.
sentences.cn: 采用了理论分析 、 仿真确认及试验调节相结合的手段.

sentences.en: You must work hard to emulate your brogher's success.
sentences.cn: 你必须努力工作,赶上你哥哥的成就.

sentences.en: You must work hard to emulate your sister.
sentences.cn: 你必须努力工作,赶上你姐姐.

trans.tran_en: to do something or behave in the same way as someone else, especially because you admire them

trans.tran_cn: 与…竞争， 赶上； 仿真， 模仿
trans.tran_en: to do something or behave in the same way as someone else, especially because you admire them
